mapper.insert: insert into t_info_title (N_ID, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS`, CON_TYPE, DESCRIPT, IMAGE, THUMBNAIL, INI_STATUS, KEY_WORDS, REC_TAGS, RELEASE_TIME, RESOURCES, SUBTITLE, TITLE, REFUSE_CASE, DURATION, CHANNEL_ID, CLASSIFY_ID, PRODUCT_ID, IS_RECOMMEND, AUDITOR, AUDIT_TIME, IS_MANAGE, CONTENT) values (#{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{str0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modiBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modiTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{conType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iniStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recTags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{resources,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refuseCase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{classifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isManage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
